verses.roman:
sanātane kahe haridāsa kari' āliṅgana
"tomāra bhāgyera sīmā nā yāya kathana

synonyms: sanātane—unto Sanātana Gosvāmī; kahe—said; haridāsa—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; kari' āliṅgana—embracing; tomāra—your; bhāgyera—of fortune; sīmā—limitation; nā yāya kathana—cannot be described.
translation: "My dear Sanātana," Haridāsa Ṭhākura said, embracing him,"no one can find the limits of your good fortune.
